label: EPC Band
def: Energy efficiency rating for homes, from Band A (most efficient) to Band G (least efficient).

label: Tenure
def: Relationship of occupant to the dwelling's ownership.

label: Domestic fuel type
def: Current most common heating system across all buildings in the area.

label: On gas grid
def: Whether most buildings in the area are connected to the gas network.

label: No. cars
def: Mean number of cars per household in the area.

label: % inhabitants under 35
def: Proportion of population under 35 years of age.

label: % inhabitants over 65
def: Proportion of population over 65 years of age.

label: Median income
def: Median income (£ per capita per year).

label: Rurality
def: How urban or rural is a given area, based on population density, from 0 (most rural) to 1 (most urban).

label: House value
def: Median value of household per area.

label: Annual fuel consumption
def: Annual mean energy consumption per household.

label: No. urban trips
def: Mean number of car trips per household per year in urban areas.

label: Total car travel
def: Mean vehicular kilometres driven per household per year.

label: Urban car travel
def: Mean vehicular kilometres driven per household in urban areas per year.
